analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokensCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#321-371):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = calculateTokenPresale(weiAmount,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#331-338)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- presale_eth_fund (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#338-340)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokensCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#321-371):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = calculateTokenPresale(weiAmount,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#331-338)
	- tokenAmount = calculateTokenCrowsale(weiAmount,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#343-344)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsale_eth_fund (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#361)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.doFinalize (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#419-428):
	External calls:
	- createTeamTokenByPercentage() (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#426)
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#426-427)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#427-428)

Crowdsale.createTeamTokenByPercentage (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#291-310) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(addr,ntoken) (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#309-310)

Crowdsale.buyTokensCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#321-371) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(receiver,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#363-365)

Crowdsale.doFinalize (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#419-428) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#426-427)

Crowdsale.createTeamTokenByPercentage has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.mint(addr,ntoken) (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#309-310)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokensCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#321-371):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = calculateTokenPresale(weiAmount,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#331-338)
	- tokenAmount = calculateTokenCrowsale(weiAmount,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#343-344)

	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#350)

	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/37/0x610d5ba8e28c0e7ea150e449a9cc57eb616ac36b.sol#361-363)
